column4: hello i have downloaded ubuntu the latest version and i copyed it to a cd i have restarted my pc with the disc inserted on the dvd rom but nothing happens can u help me pls?
when you copied it to a cd, did you burn the iso image, or the files itself, also, you may need to change your boot order in the computers bios so that it boots from cd before booting from the hdd
you need to burn the whole iso in one go, without opening it
yes, use whichever burning software you use to burn the iso file
